Detailed Description

cvmx_srio::_int_info0

This register contains the first header word of the illegal s2m transaction associated with the SLI_ERR interrupt. The remaining information is located in SRIO()_INT_INFO1. This register is only updated when the SLI_ERR is initially detected. Once the interrupt is cleared then additional information can be captured. Common errors include:

1. Load/stores with length over 32.

2. Load/stores that translate to maintenance ops with a length over 8.

3. Load ops that translate to atomic ops with other than 1, 2 and 4 byte accesses.

4. Load/store ops with a length 0.

5. Unexpected responses.

This register is reset by the h-clock reset.
